title: Character limit issue
body:
Step 1) Post *really* long comment (but is within new limit)

Step 2) See typo

Step 3) Try to to edit

Step 4) Realize the after-post limit is lower than the initial posting limit

Step 5) go to Boards feedback to report bug

>Step 1) Post *really* long comment......

and so and so on. :P

replies.body: Hey sorry, we will get this fixed up soon.
Only a minor annoyance, take your time! It's almost the holidays after all! :)
